pages.text: The Glass Shield fully protects against a single attack, and then shatters. It regenerates after a cooldown period.

The Glass Shield supports the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Mending$(): Decreases the duration it takes for the curio to recharge$(br2)$(l)Unbreaking$(): Grants a (small) chance to prevent the curio from shattering when blocking a hit$(br2)$(l)Curse of Chromatic Twisting$(): Blocked damage is returned to the attacker, however damage taken is increased while the shield is broken
$(o)Hallowed Armor was so good they made a Hallowed Armor 2
